My take is that no amount of research will sway those who religiously beleive that the shroud is the burial cloth of Christ.  But it’s fun to hear about and listen to a bunch of idiots act like they can prove something.
My own take is that I don’t need a rag to inspire my faith.
dating.title: When Atheists act like Fundamentalists
